titles.title: A resolution waiving all points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 4585) to extend the authorization of appropriations for the Taft Institute through fiscal year 1991, and against the consideration of such conference report.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-1081.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Failed of Passage in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 131 - 256 (Record Vote No: 447).

bill.summary: 10/12/1988--Introduced. Waives points of order against the conference report on H.R. 4585 (education funding) and against its consideration.
